snippet.title: Songs of Conquest - Turn based strategy - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Songs of Conquest is a classic turn-based strategy adventure that fuses RPG, armed conflict and kingdom management. Raise mighty armies, wield ancient magic and conquer distant lands to build an empire that bards will sing about for centuries!

⬇Wishlist the game⬇
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/867210/Songs_of_Conquest/?utm_source=Youtube
GOG - https://www.gog.com/game/songs_of_conquest
EGS - https://www.epicgames.com/store/p/songs-of-conquest

⬇Info about the game⬇
Website + Newsletter signup: https://www.songsofconquest.com

⬇Social accounts⬇
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/soc
Twitter: https://twitter.com/songsofconquest
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/songsofconquest/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/songsofconquest/

******* Lyrics *******
The essence within you, it is who we are.
In dead or in living, it’s near and it’s far.

In human and Rana and beasts of the land.
It flows through the forests, it breathes in the sand.

Lightning and thunder and crackling waves.
A land torn asunder by night and by day.

The empress returned, oh with death and decay.
To march upon cities with farms and with Faey.

They gather their wielders and build mighty walls.
Resisting, revolting, their armies will fall.

So, Wield all the power of those you command,
and draw out their essence to hold in your hand.

Unleash on them all, so in these final hours.
We’ll raze and rebuild to take back what was ours!

#SongsOfConquest
#Pixelart
#TBS
#Fantasygame
#4X
#RPG
#Indiegame
#Turnbased
#Lavapotion
#CoffeStain
#Gamedev
